channel.title: I-215 on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in I-215 on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 312, 313 and 314
item.description: I-15 South approaching Exit 314 - Center St. Approaching Exit 313 - I-215 South/Belt Route/Salt Lake City International Airport. Approaching Exit 312 - US-89 South/Beck St. Continue south on I-15 to Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 127 and 128
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 127 - 2300 East. Approaching Exit 128 - I-215 South/Belt Route. Continue east on I-80 for Cheyenne (Wyoming).

item.title: I-80 East - Ski Areas
item.description: Ski Area directions on I-80 east approaching I-215. Use I-215 South (Exit 128) for Solitude, Brighton, Snowbird, and Alta Ski Areas. Continue east on I-80 for Park City and Deer Valley Ski Areas.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 127 and 128
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 127 - 2300 East. Approaching Exit 128 - I-215 South/Belt Route. Continue east on I-80 for Cheyenne (Wyoming).

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 126 and Approaching Exit 128
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 126 - 1300 East. Approaching Exit 128 - I-215 South/Belt Route.

item.title: I-215 West Approaching I-15
item.description: I-215 West approaching I-15. Use Exit 12A for I-15 North/Las Vegas. Approaching I-15 South/Los Angeles (California).

item.title: I-215 West - Exit 12A
item.description: I-215 west approaching Exit 12A - I-15 North/Las Vegas/Downtown/Strip.

item.title: I-215 West - Exit 10
item.description: I-215 west approaching Exit 10 - Sunset Road/McCarran Airport

item.title: End NV-564 West at I-11/I-215
item.description: End NV-564 West at I-11/I-215 junction. Merge right for I-11/US-93/US-95 south. Continue west for I-215 west.

item.title: NV-564 West at I-11/I-215/I-515
item.description: Entrance ramp to I-515/US-93/US-95 North to Las Vegas and I-11/US-93/US-95 South to Boulder City. End of NV-564 (Lake Mead Pkwy) west and begin of I-215 westbound.

item.title: NV-564 West Approaching I-11/I-515/I-215/US-93/US-95
item.description: NV-564 West (Lake Mead Parkway) approaching I-11/I-515/I-215/US-93/US-95 in Henderson.

item.title: NV-564 West Approaching I-515/US-93/US-95 North
item.description: NV-564 West Approaching I-515/US-93/US-95 North to Las Vegas

item.title: I-11 North - Exits 22 and Exit 62
item.description: I-11 north approaching Exit 22 - I-215 West/NV-564/Lake Mead Parkway. Approaching I-515 Exit 62 - Auto Show Drive. This is the north end of I-11. US-93 and US-95 join I-515 northbound. I-515 begins here northbound.

item.title: I-11 North - Exit 22
item.description: I-11 North approaching Exit 23 - I-215 West/NV-564 East/Lake Mead Parkway

item.title: End I-215 East at I-515/I-11
item.description: End I-215 East at I-515/I-11 in Henderson. Use Exit 1 for I-11/US-93/US-95 South/Boulder City and I-515/US-93/US-95 North/Las Vegas. Roadway becomes NV-564/Lake Mead Parkway.

item.title: End I-215 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-215 east approaching Exit 1 - I-515/US-93/US-95/Las Vegas and I-11/US-93/US-95/Boulder City. This is the east end of I-215. The roadway continues as Lake Mead Parkway/NV-564.

item.title: I-215 East Approaching Exit 1
item.description: I-215 east approaching Exit 1 - I-11/US-93/US-95 South/Boulder City and I-515/US-93/US-95 North/Las Vegas. Freeway ends after Exit 1 and roadway becomes NV-564/Lake Mead Parkway

item.title: I-215 East - Exit 6
item.description: I-215 east at Exit 6 - NV-146/Pecos Road

item.title: George Crockett Road East at I-215
item.description: George Crockett Road East at I-215 onramp. Use I-215 East for McCarran Airport. Continue east on George Crockett Road for Rental Car Return.

item.title: I-15 South/I-215 Ramp at Las Vegas Blvd.
item.description: I-15 South/I-215 Ramp at Las Vegas Blvd./Rental Car Return.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 34
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 34 - I-215 East/Henderson. Use I-215 east for McCarran International Airport.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 34
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 34 - I-215 East/Henderson. Use Exit 34 for the McCarran International Airport.

item.title: I-215 South - Exits 13 and 12
item.description: I-215 south at Exit 13 - UT-68/Redwood Road. Approaching Exit 12 - I-15/Salt Lake/Provo.

item.title: UT-201 West - Exits 15A and 14
item.description: UT-201 west at Exit 15A - I-215 South. Approaching Exit 14 - 3200 West.

item.title: UT-201 West - Exits 15C-A
item.description: UT-201 west at Exit 15C - UT-68/Redwood Road and Exit 15B - I-215 North. Approaching Exit 15A - I-215 South.

item.title: UT-201 West - Exits 15 C-B
item.description: UT-201 west approaching Exits 15 C-B - I-215 North/UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 130 and 129
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 130 - I-215 South. Approaching Exit 129 - UT-186/Foothill Drive. Continue west on I-80 for Salt Lake City/SLC International Airport.

item.title: UT-201 East - Exits 15B and 15C
item.description: UT-201 east at Exit 15B - I-215 North. Approaching Exit 15C - UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: UT-201 East - Exit 15A and 15B
item.description: UT-201 east at Exit 15A - I-215 South. Approaching Exit 15B - I-215 North.

item.title: UT-201 East - Exits 15A and 15B
item.description: UT-201 east approaching Exit 15A - I-215 South and Exit 15B - I-215 North.

item.title: UT-201 East - Exits 14 and 15A-B
item.description: UT-201 East at Exit 14 - 3200 West. Approaching Exit 15A-B - 1-215.

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 130 and 129
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 130 - I-215 South. Approaching Exit 129 - UT-186/Foothill Drive/Parleys Way. Next 8 exits on I-80 west are for Salt Lake. The UT-186 shield is an old style Utah state highway shield.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 130
item.description: I-80 West approaching Exit 130 - I-215/Belt Route. This is the western edge of the Salt Lake City area belt route.

item.title: End I-215 North at I-15
item.description: End I-215 north at I-15 in North Salt Lake. There is no end sign on I-215, just a junction I-15 sign.

item.title: I-215 North - Exit 27
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 27 - UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: I-80 Exit 117 - I-215 Ramps
item.description: I-215/I-80 interchange, from I-80 east. Use left lanes for I-215 north to Ogden; right lanes for I-215 south to Provo.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 117, 118, and 120
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 117 - I-215/Odgen/Provo. I-215 is the Salt Lake City Belt Route. Approaching Exit 118 - UT-68/Redwood Road, and Exit 120 - I-15.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 117 and 118
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 117 - I-215/Ogden/Provo. Approaching Exit 118 - UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 115 and Exit 117.
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 115 A-C - Bangerter Highway/SLC International Airport/North Temple. Approaching Exit 117 - I-215/Ogden/Provo. In the I-215 shield is the text UTAH. More and more of these types of shields with the state names are appearing around Utah.

item.title: I-215 North - Exits 26 and 27
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 26 - UT-67/Legacy Parkway. Approaching Exit 27 - UT-68/Redwood Road. Continue north on I-215 for I-15 and Ogden. Trucks are not allowed to use Legacy Parkway.

item.title: I-215 North - Exit 25
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 25 - 2100 North.

item.title: I-215 North - Exit 26
item.description: I-215 north approaching Exit 26 - UT-67/Legacy Parkway. Continue north on I-215 for I-15 and Ogden.

item.title: I-215 North - Exit 23
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 23 - 7th North.

item.title: I-215 North Approaching I-80
item.description: I-215 north approaching Exit 22 - I-80/Reno (NV)/Cheyenne (WY).

item.title: I-215 North - Exits 21 and 22
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 21 - California Ave. Approaching Exit 22 - I-80/Reno(NV)/Cheyenne(WY).

item.title: I-215 North - Exits 20A and 20B
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 20A - UT-201 East. Approaching Exit 20B - UT-201 West - Magna.

item.title: I-215 South at I-15 Split
item.description: I-215 south at I-15. Use right lane for I-15 South/Las Vegas; left lane for I-15 North/Salt Lake.

item.title: I-215 South - Exit 12
item.description: I-215 south at Exit 12 - I-15 North/Salt Lake; I-15 South/Las Vegas. Continue on the I-215 Belt Route for Cheyenne (Wyoming) and Ski Areas.

item.title: I-215 South - Exit 12
item.description: I-215 South approaching Exit 12 - I-15 South/Las Vegas;I-15 North/Salt Lake.

item.title: UT-68 South (Redwood Road) at I-215 East
item.description: UT-68 South (Redwood Road) at I-215 east onramp in Taylorsville. This is the southern intersection of I-215 with UT-68.

item.title: I-215 South - Exits 20B and 20A
item.description: I-215 south at Exit 20B - UT-201 West/Magna; approaching Exit 20A - UT-201 East.

item.title: I-215 South - Exits 21, 20B, 20A
item.description: I-215 South at Exit 21 - California Ave. Approaching Exit 20B - UT-201 West, and Exit 20A - UT-201 East.

item.title: I-215 South - Exits 22B and 22A
item.description: I-215 south approaching Exit 22B - I-80 West/Airport/Reno. Approaching Exit 22A - I-80 East/Cheyenne (Wyoming).

item.title: I-215 South - Salt Lake City International Airport Exits
item.description: Salt Lake City International Airport exits on I-215 south. For General Aviation, use Exit 23. For Salt Lake City International Airport , use Exit 22B. For the Utah State Fairpark use Exit 23.

item.title: I-215 South - Exit 25
item.description: I-215 south at Exit 25 - 2100 North.

item.title: End UT-67 South
item.description: End UT-67 south at I-215. There are no ramps for UT-67 south to I-215, just a left merge lane.

item.title: CA-210 West - Exit 74
item.description: CA-210 west at Exit 74 - I-215 North/Barstow. Continue west on CA-210 for Pasadena.

item.title: CA-210 West Approaching Exit 74
item.description: CA-210 west approaching Exit 74 - I-215 North/Barstow. CA-210 continues west towards Pasadena.

item.title: CA-210 West - Exit 75A and Exit 74
item.description: CA-210 west at Exit 75A - H St. Approaching Exit 74 - I-215 North/Barstow.

item.title: CA-210 West - Exit 75B
item.description: CA-210 West at Exit 75B - I-215 South/Riverside. Continue west on CA-210 for Pasadena, and I-215 North/Barstow Jct.

item.title: CA-210 West Approaching Exit 75B
item.description: CA-210 west approaching Exit 75B - I-215 South/Los Angeles/Riverside. CA-210 shield is on the right.

item.title: I-80 East At Exit 128 and Approaching Exit 129
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 128 - I-215 South/Belt Route. Approaching Exit 129 - Foothill Drive/Parleys Way. I-80 continues east towards Cheyenne.

item.title: I-80 East - Ski Areas
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 118 - I-215 South/Belt Route. A sign informs which exit to take for local ski areas. Use I-215 south for Cottonwood Canyons. Continue on I-80 east towards Cheyenne for Park City.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 126 and Approaching Exit 128
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 126 - 1300 East. Approaching Exit 128 - I-215 South/Belt Route.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 117. Approaching Exits 118 and 120
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 117 - I-215/Odgen/Provo. I-215 is the Salt Lake City Belt Route. Approaching Exit 118 - UT-68/Redwood Road, and Exit 120 - I-15.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 115 and Exit 117.
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 115 - Bangerter Highway/Airport/North Temple. Approaching Exit 117 - I-215/Ogden/Provo.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 297 and Exit 298
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 297 - UT-48/7200 South. Approaching Exit 298 - I-215/Belt Route. Continue north on I-15 for Salt Lake.

item.title: CA-60 East Approaching Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east approaching Exit 53A - CA-91/Riverside, and Exit 53B - I-215 North/San Bernardino.

item.title: CA-60 East at Exit 52B and Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east at Main St. Approaching CA-91/Riverside, and I-215 north to San Bernardino. CA-60 and I-215 are multiplexed east through Riverside.

item.title: CA-60 East Exit 52B
item.description: CA-60 east approaching Exit 52B - Main St. and Exits 53AB CA-91/I-215

item.title: CA-60 East Exit 53B
item.description: CA-60 East/I-215 South at Exit 53B - I-215/CA-60 split. I-215 south to San Diego; CA-60 east to Indio.

item.title: CA-60 East Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 53A - CA-91 South to Riverside and Beach Cities. New control city on CA-60 is Indio.

item.title: CA-60 East Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 53A - CA-91 South/Riverside/Beach Cities, and Exit 53B - I-215 North/San Bernardino.

item.title: CA-60 East Exits 53AB and 52B
item.description: CA-60 east approaching Exit 52B - Main St., Exit 53A - CA-91 South/Riverside, and Exit 53B - I-215 North/San Bernardino.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 72
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 72 - I-215/Riverside/San Bernardino, 1/2 mile.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 72
item.description: I-10 west to Los Angeles at Exit 72 - I-215/Riverside/San Bernardino/Barstow.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 72
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 72 - I-215/Riverside/San Bernardino/Barstow.

item.title: I-15 North at Exit 34, I-215
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 34, I-215/CR-215 the southern Las Vegas Beltway

item.title: I-15 North at Exit 34, I-215
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 34, I-215/CR-215/Henderson. I-215/CR-215 is the Las Vegas Beltway

item.title: I-15 North at I-215
item.description: I-215/CR-215 separation on I-15 north

item.title: I-215 East at I-515
item.description: Eastern end of I-215 east at I-515/US-93/US-95 to Las Vegas and Boulder City. I-215 turns into NV-564, Lake Mead Pkwy

item.title: I-215 East Exit 8
item.description: Outer I-215 beltway at Exit 8, Sunset Road/McCarran Airport

item.title: NV-564 West at I-215 and I-515
item.description: Entrance ramp to I-515/US-93/US-95 to Las Vegas and Boulder City. End of NV-564 (Lake Mead Pkwy) west at I-515/I-215.

item.title: NV-564 West at I-215 and I-515
item.description: Entrance ramp to I-515/US-93/US-95 south to Boulder City. End of NV-564 (Lake Mead Pkwy) west at I-515/I-215.

item.title: NV-564 West at I-215 and I-515
item.description: Entrance ramp to I-515/US-93/US-95 north to Las Vegas. End of NV-564 (Lake Mead Pkwy) west at I-515/I-215.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 117
item.description: I-80 West at I-215 Exit

item.title: I-80 West Exit 117/Exit 118
item.description: I-80 West Approaching West Side of I-215 Beltway

item.title: I-80 West Exit 130
item.description: I-80 West at Eastern End of I-215 Beltway

item.title: I-15 South Exit 315 and Exit 316
item.description: I-15 South Exits 315 and 316. Exit 316 - I-215/Belt Route/SL Intl. Airport, and Exit 315 - US-89 South/Beck St.

item.title: I-15 South Exits 315 and Exit 316
item.description: I-15 South Exits 315 and 316. Exit 316 - I-215/Belt Route/SL Intl. Airport, and Exit 315 - US-89 South/Beck St.
